articles.author: Katherine Donlevy
articles.title: American nurse killed by man she met in Budapest nightclub during vacation to ‘happy place’: police - New York Post
articles.description: The suspect’s internet history was riddled with searches on body disposal, police procedures, and whether pigs eat bodies.
articles.content:
An American nurse’s trip to her “happy place” turned to tragedy when she was killed this week by a man she met at a nightclub in Hungary, police said Friday.
A manhunt erupted when Kenzie Michalski,… [+2495 chars]

articles.title: Here are new guidelines for preventing stroke, the nation’s 4th biggest killer - The Associated Press
articles.description: The majority of strokes could be prevented, according to new guidelines aimed at helping people and their doctors do just that. The first new guidelines on stroke prevention in 10 years from the American Heart Association include recommendations for people an…
articles.content:
The majority of strokes could be prevented, according to new guidelines aimed at helping people and their doctors do just that.
